MonsterTrait.Name: Keen Smell
MonsterTrait.Text: The panther has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

MonsterTrait.Name: Pounce
MonsterTrait.Text: If the panther moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the panther can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

MonsterAction.Name: Bite
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Claw
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.
